hero.title: SavannahDynasty
hero.subtitle: We provide the highest standard of elite Savannah cats with unparalleled quality and care

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: All our Savannah cats come from champion bloodlines with fully documented pedigrees

health.title: Health Guarantee
health.description: Comprehensive health screening and lifetime genetic guarantee on all our cats

care.title: Loving Care
care.description: Each cat is raised with exceptional love and socialization in luxurious conditions

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: 24/7 support from our team of cat care specialists

f1.name: Savannah F1
f1.description: Distinguished by exotic appearance, high intelligence and energetic temperament. These cats are first generation hybrids with African serval, combining wild grace with the devotion of a domestic pet. Savannah F1 is the choice for those seeking not just a cat, but a true companion with character.

f2.name: Savannah F2
f2.description: Perfect balance of wild beauty and domesticated temperament. Impressive appearance.

kitten.name: Savannah Kittens
kitten.description: Adorable kittens from champion lines. Early socialization and care.

exotic.title: Exotic Heritage
exotic.description: Hybrid of African serval and domestic cat, creating a truly unique breed

limited.title: Limited Generations
limited.description: F1-F3 generations are extremely rare due to complex breeding requirements

unique.title: Unique Characteristics
unique.description: Exceptional intelligence, dog-like loyalty, and stunning appearance

pricing.title: Investment in Elegance
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing for our exceptional Savannah cats

secure.title: Secure Transactions
secure.description: All payments processed through secure encrypted channels

flexible.title: Flexible Options
flexible.description: Multiple payment methods for your convenience

protected.title: Buyer Protection
protected.description: Your purchase is protected by our comprehensive warranty

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Perfect Match?
cta.subtitle: Start your journey with us today. Our expert team is ready to help you find the perfect feline companion that will bring joy to your life.

footer.tagline: Discover the grace and intelligence of Savannah cats from SavannahDynasty. Ethical breeding, exceptional quality.

breeders.title: Our Experienced Breeders
breeders.subtitle: Meet the passionate professionals behind our exceptional cats. Our network of certified breeders represents decades of experience in feline genetics and care.

philosophy.title: Our Breeding Philosophy
philosophy.description: We partner exclusively with ethical breeders who prioritize health, temperament, and breed standards above all. Each breeder in our network has been thoroughly vetted for adherence to our high standards of quality and ethics.

ethical.title: Ethical Practices
ethical.description: Commitment to humane breeding methods with emphasis on cat welfare and health

champion.title: Champion Lines
champion.description: Specialization in cats from award-winning show lines with documented pedigrees

local.title: Local Expertise
local.description: Strategically located breeders providing easy access and ongoing support

health.title: Health Testing
health.description: Mandatory genetic testing and health screening of all breeding cats

documentation.title: Complete Documentation
documentation.description: Detailed records of pedigree, vaccinations, and health history for each cat

environment.title: Premium Environment
environment.description: Spacious, clean facilities designed for optimal cat wellbeing

socialization.title: Early Socialization
socialization.description: Kittens raised in home environment with focus on temperament and adaptability

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help
